mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID AS USER_ID , M.ESNTL_ID AS PASSWORD , 1 ENABLED , USER_NM , EMAIL_ADRES AS USER_EMAIL , 'USR' AS USER_SE , STDYINST_ID , M.ESNTL_ID , ADMINAT1 AS ADMINAT , ADMINAT2 AS ROLEADMINAT , IFNULL(STPLATINFO_AGRE_AT, 'N') AS stplatinfoAgreAt , IF(M.PSWD_LAST_PNTTM <= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH), 'Y','N') AS PSWD_MON_OVR FROM COMTNUSERINFO M, ( SELECT T1.ESNTL_ID, IF(IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T1.AUTHOR_CODE IN ('ROLE_ADMIN', 'SUB_ADMIN') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0)=0,'N','Y') AS ADMINAT1, IF(IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN T1.AUTHOR_CODE IN ('ROLE_ADMIN') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0)=0,'N','Y') AS ADMINAT2 FROM SYSMEMBAUTHORINFO T1 JOIN COMTNAUTHORINFO T2 ON T2.AUTHOR_CODE = T1.AUTHOR_CODE GROUP BY T1.ESNTL_ID ) TA WHERE M.ESNTL_ID = TA.ESNTL_ID AND M.USER_ID = #{id}
SELECT A.ESNTL_ID USER_ID, A.AUTHOR_CODE AUTHORITY FROM SYSMEMBAUTHORINFO A , COMVNUSERMASTER B WHERE A.ESNTL_ID = B.ESNTL_ID AND B.USER_ID = #{id}

select.if: SELECT mber_id AS id , mber_nm AS name , ihidNum AS ihidNum , password AS password , mber_email_adres AS email , 'GNR' AS userSe , '-' AS orgnztId , esntl_id AS uniqId FROM COMTNGNRLMBER WHERE mber_id = #{id} AND mber_sttus = 'P'

SELECT ENTRPRS_MBER_ID AS id , cmpny_nm AS name , entrprs_mber_password AS password , bizrno AS ihidNum , applcnt_email_adres AS email , 'ENT' AS userSe , '-' AS orgnztId , esntl_id AS uniqId FROM COMTNENTRPRSMBER WHERE ENTRPRS_MBER_ID = #{id} AND entrprs_mber_sttus = 'P'

SELECT E.USER_ID AS id , E.user_nm AS name , password AS password , E.email_adres AS email , 'USR' AS userSe , E.STDYINST_ID AS stdyinstId , E.ESNTL_ID AS uniqId , B.IP_INFO AS ip , IFNULL(E.STPLATINFO_AGRE_AT, 'N') AS STPLATINFO_AGRE_AT FROM COMTNUSERINFO E LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNLOGINPOLICY B ON E.ESNTL_ID = B.ESNTL_ID WHERE 1=1 AND BINARY(E.USER_ID) = REPLACE(#{id},'SYSsu.','')
